text: The 1957–58 WHL season was the sixth season of the Western Hockey League. The Vancouver Canucks were the President's Cup champions as they beat the Calgary Stampeders in four games in the final series. == Final Standings == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Coast Division Standings1957-58 Western Hockey League Standings !
